name: DoS
description:
This is a basic 2D block breaking game called Destroyer of Stars. During the making of this game I learned a lot of different coding systems. I learned how to code a scoring and lives system, however I took the scoring system out because it wasn't accurate.

While I was making this game, it originally started out as a minecraft themed game and it slowly changed into a starwars themed game. Because I am in a class with four other people, we all worked on this project together getting ideas from each other, however I did this project much differently then anyone else in my class.

Most people in my class had to hand create every one of there levels which leaves them with not many levels, however I created my levels through coding so I was able to have many more levels then anyone else. There are a total of 6 levels and I will hopefully have a boss level coming soon! If you have any ideas please feel free to leave a comment and let me know about anything you may want me to add!
